name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Actual behavior**
A clear and concise description of what actually happened

**Test or repo**
Please include a failing unit test that you expect to pass

Alternatively, you can provide a link to a GitHub repository with a minimal reproduction
